item.title: My First Blog
item.description: My first Blog post using Hugo inspired and guided by Sive https://www.sivalabs.in/creating-blog-using-hugo-asciidoc-netlify/ Words of noob class Hello { String hello() { return "Hello World" } } Summary Since you are here .. read out my second blog post (I hope i will continue to blog). Bye
